effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

flavor_text.black_white: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.
